member.name: T:Olive.Services.Integration.IIntegrationQueueItem
member.summary: Stores one item requested for processing via an external service.

member.name: P:Olive.Services.Integration.IIntegrationQueueItem.IntegrationService
member.summary: The name of the integration service used for processing this item.

member.name: P:Olive.Services.Integration.IIntegrationQueueItem.Request
member.summary: The body of the request being sent to the integration service.

member.name: P:Olive.Services.Integration.IIntegrationQueueItem.Response
member.summary: The response generated by the remote service.

member.name: P:Olive.Services.Integration.IIntegrationQueueItem.ErrorResponse
member.summary: The error encountered in processing this item.

member.name: P:Olive.Services.Integration.IIntegrationQueueItem.DatePicked
member.summary: Specifies the date and time when this item was picked for processing. If it's null, it means this item has not been picked yet.

member.name: P:Olive.Services.Integration.IIntegrationQueueItem.RequestDate
member.summary: Specifies the date and time when this item was first requested and added to the queue.

member.name: P:Olive.Services.Integration.IIntegrationQueueItem.ResponseDate
member.summary: Specifies the date when the response was retrieved from the remote service.

member.name: T:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationManager
member.summary: Provides services for integration services.

member.name: F:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationManager.IntegrationServices
member.summary: Key = TRequest|TResponse Value = TService

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationManager.Process(Olive.Services.Integration.IIntegrationQueueItem)
member.summary: Will find a Service Registered to process the item.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationManager.ProcessOutstandingItems
member.summary: Uses the right Integration Service to process the outstanding items in all queues. This should be called as an Automated Task in the application.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationManager.ProcessOutstandingItems(System.String)
member.summary: Uses the right Integration Service to process the next item in that queue.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationManager.Register``3
member.summary: Registers an integration service.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationManager.Request``2(``0)
member.summary: Inserts a queu item to call this service and waits until the item is processed. Then it will return the response.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationManager.RequestAsync``2(``0)
member.summary: Inserts a request in the queue and immediately returns without waiting for a response. It will return the token string for this request, that can be queried later on for a response (using Await Response).

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationManager.AwaitResponse``1(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: It will wait until a response is provided by another thread to the integration queue item specified by its token.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationManager.InjectResponse``2(``1)
member.summary: Injects an asyncronous waiter which will inject the provided response for one potential future request. It will check every 5 milliseconds to see if a request item is inserted in the queue, and in that case respond to it.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationService`2.Request(`0)
member.summary: Inserts a queu item to call this service and waits until the item is processed. Then it will return the response.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationService`2.RegisterImplementor``1
member.summary: Registers an integration service implementor.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationService`2.InjectResponse(`1)
member.summary: Injects an asyncronous waiter which will inject the provided response for one potential future request. It will check every 5 milliseconds to see if a request item is inserted in the queue, and in that case respond to it.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationService`2.AwaitResponse(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: It will wait until a response is provided by another thread to the integration queue item specified by its token.

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IntegrationService`2.RequestAsync(`0)
member.summary: Inserts a request in the queue and immediately returns without waiting for a response. It will return the token string for this request, that can be queried later on for a response (using Await Response).

member.name: M:Olive.Services.Integration.IServiceImplementor`2.GetResponse(`0)
member.summary: It will process the specified request, send it to the remote service, and return the response.
